item.description:
Native American Soul Retrieval Intensive
with KESHAV HOWE

This evening's intensive will explore the fundaments of soul loss and soul retrieval. From a shamanic perspective, when a person suffers an emotional or physical trauma, a piece of their soul essence or vitality may separate and travel into another reality or emotional safe haven in order to survive the experience. From this place of innocence, there is no ideology to defend, or a list of limiting beliefs - there is only wonderment. Through the process of soul retrieval, we rediscover our true and innocent nature. We are then fully able to engage in life without losing ourselves in a victim identity. Join us as we explore this very sacred healing process.

Sacred Rivers Yoga
GLASTONBURY, CT
Time: 7 to 9 p.m.
Cost: $20 cash
item.name: Soul Retrieval
